Class LayerBP

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtfx.lib.ztrash.network.Layer
      • com.qtfx.lib.ztrash.network.LayerBP

  • public class LayerBP
extends Layer
    Back propagation layer without momentum.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
